## Bcp47.LanguageFilterOptions interface

Options for  functions.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface LanguageChooserOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [filter?](./ts-bcp47.bcp47.languagefilteroptions.filter.md) |  | 'primaryLanguage' \| 'none' | <i>(Optional)</i> Indicates how to filter the language list - <code>'primaryLanguage'</code> indicates the each primary language should appear only once in the list in its most similar form. A filter value of <code>'none'</code> reports all matching variants of any primary language in order of similarity. Default is <code>'primaryLanguage'</code> |
|  [ultimateFallback?](./ts-bcp47.bcp47.languagefilteroptions.ultimatefallback.md) |  | string \| [Subtags](./ts-bcp47.bcp47.subtags.md) \| [LanguageTag](./ts-bcp47.bcp47.languagetag.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> An optional [language specification](./ts-bcp47.bcp47.languagespec.md) indicating a language to be returned if the filter call would otherwise return an empty list (i.e. no languages match). |
|  [use?](./ts-bcp47.bcp47.languagefilteroptions.use.md) |  | 'desiredLanguage' \| 'availableLanguage' | <i>(Optional)</i> Indicates whether to return the matching language from the desired list or the available list. Default is <code>'availableLanguage'</code>. |
